body:
So yesterday, 1.9 was released and I'm just wondering what you guys think of it? Do you like what they have done or do you think its a horrible update. My opinion is that its meh; some updates I like about it and others I don't like about it. 

What are you're opinions?
body_tagged:

title: 1.9 opinions?

replies.body: Its a huge dank meme. Tbh i extremely dislike what they did to pvp :(

replies.body_tagged: U CAN FLY

replies.body: I would like to play 1.9 in a survival world tbh but minecraft is just turning into tekkit or whatever it is called
replies.body_tagged: I would like to play 1.9 in a survival world tbh but minecraft is just turning into tekkit or whatever it is called

replies.body:
I like it a lot. It added a positive spin to the game, making it more challenging now. I've been playing a lot on SMPs, and I love it. In terms of PvE, I no longer feel invincible, and can't rush every mob I see. Now I have to plan which mob to attack first, and time my hits/shield blocks to take the least amount of damage.  

This will defiantly add an interesting twist to PvP. Shields have the ability to block arrows, different weapons do different amounts of damage and extra perks (like the knockback effect with a sword) with different amounts of cooldown. On top of that, pots can be attached to arrows, which could be interesting to see (imagine what could happen if you could heal a team mate by shooting him with a health 2 pot arrow). There's also elytras, which will give the element of flight to PvP. There's also some nifty enchants, like the frost walk and mending.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
I watched a YouTuber say the EXACT same thing. Mod. Minecraft pvp feels like a mod now, with cooldown times and shields and potion tipped arrows. But other than that, what most people don't focus on are the other things added, but I understand because this is a pvp server. Other than the pvp tho, I like 1.9. I like the new command blocks, extension of the end, etc. IMO 1.9 is focused on survival more than servers, because the end stuff is pretty cool and the elytra is sick too. I just thing they ruined pvp, and what AskMeToRap said about it pretty much sums it up.

"More like Minecraft 1.9 Make-Game-Easier-For-Little-Kids Update."

replies.body: If servers don't go crazy with the shield and arrow types, then better hit detection than 1.8 and many things are disableable, which makes it not so bad. Basically an improvement over 1.8, though 1.8 was awful. Wish they'd just switch the pvp back to the way it was in 1.7.

replies.body: I actually like some of the things added. I like the wings and I actually like the shields. But the fact that they apparently messed up the hit detection even more (which up until now I didn't think we possible), added the cooldown and waaaayyy too many off the new arrow types kinda ruined mc pvp.
